title: Sex While She Sleeps
description: Sydney wants to sleep, but her neighbor is making too much noise. Confronting the intimidating man about his loud power tools seems like a bad idea. Sydney’s sleeping pills are her solution. But while she’s asleep, a man breaks into her home. He’s been watching her. He wants to violate her drugged and vulnerable body in ways she’s never imagined. Contains: sleep sex, forced sex fantasy, and rough sex.
author: Angelina Blake
